      • loadCf

        public static HMapIF loadCf(RetrievalEnvironment env,
            String queryPath)
                     throws Exception
        Loads CF values for the set of terms extracted from a query file.
        Parameters:
        env - RetrievalEnvironment object associated with the index
        queryPath - Path to the query file
        Returns:
        A Map of term ids to its cf values.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • loadQueries

        public static HMapIV<String> loadQueries(com.google.common.io.InputSupplier<? extends InputStream> queryInputSupplier)
                                  throws ParserConfigurationException,
                                         SAXException,
                                         IOException
        Reads a query set in an XML format as follows: <parameters> <query qid="Query_ID">Query Text</query> </parameters>
        Parameters:
        queryInputSupplier - An input supplier that provides the queries
        Returns:
        A map of query id to query text
        Throws:
        ParserConfigurationException
        SAXException
        IOException

      • loadQueries

                                  throws Exception
        Loads a set of queries from an input file.
        Parameters:
        queryPath - Path to the query file
        Returns:
        A Map of query id to query text
        Throws:
        Exception

      • parseQueries

        public static HMapIV<String[]> parseQueries(RetrievalEnvironment env,
                            String queryPath)
                                     throws Exception
        Loads and tokenizes a set of queries.
        Parameters:
        queryPath - Path to the file containing the queries
        Returns:
        Map of query id to an array of strings (i.e., the tokens of the original query)
        Throws:
        Exception

      • queryToIntegerCode

        public static HMapIV<int[]> queryToIntegerCode(RetrievalEnvironment env,
                               HMapIV<String> parsedQueries)
                                        throws Exception
        Throws:
        Exception

      • queryToIntegerCode

        public static HMapIV<int[]> queryToIntegerCode(RetrievalEnvironment env,
                               String queryPath)
                                        throws Exception
        Reads and converts queries into their integer forms.
        Parameters:
        env - RetrievalEnvironment object associated with the index
        queryPath - Path to the query file
        Returns:
        A Map of query ids to a list of integers. Each integer i is the code for term i in the query. Note that depending on the tokenizer, stopwords may be removed and/or stemming might apply to the given query phrase.
        Throws:
        Exception
